And before this during it was 605 during the Armenian era, on the 26th of the month of October, [when] all the earth began to shake.and many Muslim towns at the borders of Arabia which is Aleppo were razed to the foundationsand the Lord protected the Christian people up until now, and there were unceasing tremors until the new year, so that it was impossible to calculate or number the earthquakes for the 14 months.
